name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience excelling in high-performance application development, particularly skilled in **Python**, **JavaScript**, and adept at working with **APIs** and **JSON**. Proficient in deploying solutions that leverage AI/ML technologies, delivering predictive analytics and real-time data processing. Hands-on expertise in frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, as well as crafting robust backend applications with **FastAPI** and **Django**.

Experienced in cloud-native system deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines to enhance operational efficiency. Committed to quality and compliance, aligning development efforts with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. 

Strong analytical thinker with proven problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and a solid background in **MLOps**, including model training and orchestration utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
